title: That One Introspective Girl (My Girl)
description: She lives in her thoughts, a universe I'm still learning to navigate. My introspective girl - the one who speaks in silences, dreams in questions, and holds mysteries in her eyes. A story of decoding her quiet world, where every glance holds meaning and every pause tells a story.
